NK010(tha)018:1: nye 'byed rlung gi phra ma mkhan //
NK010(tha)018:2: rlung lha'i bu la srin po'i tsha //
NK010(tha)018:3: pha ni rlung lha wa skyes yin //
NK010(tha)018:4: ma ni srin mo kha 'bar ma //
NK010(tha)018:5: gnyis med bu gcig byung ba ni //
NK010(tha)018:6: nye 'byed chen mo phra ma mkhan //
NK010(tha)018:7: sku mdog dud kha chen mo la //
NK010(tha)018:8: 'jigs pa'i khro gnyer mang pos brgyan //
NK010(tha)018:9: g.yas kyi dang po bya rog gong ru bsnams //
NK010(tha)018:10: nyams pa spyan gyis gzigs par byed //
NK010(tha)018:11: g.yon gyi dang po 'ug ru bsnams //
NK010(tha)018:12: mi 'chor rtog pa rab tu gsal //
NK010(tha)018:13: g.yas 'og lcags kyu s+t+wa re bsnams //
NK010(tha)018:14: nyams pa mgo lus 'dral ba'i rtags //
NK010(tha)018:15: g.yon gyi 'og ma rlung gi rkyal pa bsnams //
NK010(tha)018:16: nyams pa rlung la bskur ba'i rtags //
NK010(tha)018:17: khyod kyi phrag pa g.yas pa na //
NK010(tha)018:18: lcags kyi bya khra g.yu mig can //
NK010(tha)018:19: snang srid mi mthong gcig kyang med //
NK010(tha)018:20: dam nyams phrag pa g.yas kyi pho lha phrol //
NK010(tha)018:21: khyod kyi phrag pa g.yon pa na //
NK010(tha)018:22: zangs kyi bya khra gser mig can //
NK010(tha)018:23: srid pa gsum yang dus gcig gzigs //
NK010(tha)018:24: phrag la g.yon gyi mo lha phrol //
NK010(tha)018:25: khyod kyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu ni //
NK010(tha)018:26: shel gyi bya khyung g.yu mig can //
NK010(tha)018:27: dge sdig gnyis kyi las kyang gzigs //
NK010(tha)018:28: khyod kyi rgyab kyi sog pa la //
NK010(tha)018:29: stag dang spyang kii rngam zhing rgyug /
NK010(tha)018:30: nyams pa zas su za bar byed //
NK010(tha)018:31: nyams pa'i rgyab kyi dgra lha phrol //
NK010(tha)018:32: khyod kyi mdun gyi lhen sna la //
NK010(tha)018:34: snang srid dbang du sdud par byed //
NK010(tha)018:35: dam nyams mdun gyi srog lha phrol //
NK010(tha)018:36: khyod ni stong gsum phra ma mkhan //
NK010(tha)018:37: rlung lha'i bu la srin po'i tsha //
NK010(tha)018:38: mchu ni lcags kyi gzong bas rno //
NK010(tha)018:39: dam nyams mi dang lha'i bar du dbyer chug cig /
NK010(tha)018:40: khyod kyis mi byed gang yang med //
NK010(tha)018:41: lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed cing //
NK010(tha)018:42: 'byed par khyod kyis nus par byed //
NK010(tha)018:43: tshe gsum dran byed pho rog ma //
NK010(tha)018:44: khyod kyis mi dran ci yang med //
NK010(tha)018:45: bstan pa gnyan la gnod pa yi //
NK010(tha)018:46: dam nyams bsgral ba'i zhing bcu 'di //
NK010(tha)018:47: 'go bar byed pa'i lha dang phrol //
NK010(tha)018:48: stong grogs byed pa'i gnyen dang phrol //
NK010(tha)018:49: hu lu mun mthong 'ug pa ma //
NK010(tha)018:50: khyod kyis mi mthong gang yang med //
NK010(tha)018:51: bstan pa gnyan la gnod byed pa'i //
NK010(tha)018:52: dam nyams bsgral ba'i zhing bcu 'di //
NK010(tha)018:53: khyod kyis bsgral ba'i phrin las mdzod //
